chunk_text:
Any damage that causes the vehicle to be removed from the fleet will result in charges for the subsequent damages and loss of projected revenue. #### Damage Policy
At West Hills Winery Tours, our goal is to curate a unique experience for all of our guests. To achieve this, extensive planning and coordination with various wineries and services are required. Therefore, if you need to cancel, please be aware of our Cancellation Policy, as well as the policies of each winery planned for your visit.
